conversation.text: This is the only way it could have ended.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: War no longer needed its ultimate practitioner.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: It had become a self-sustaining system.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: Man was crushed under the wheels of a machine created to create the machine created to crush the machine.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: Samsara of cut sinew and bone.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: Death without life.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: Null ouroboros.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: All that remained is war without reason.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: A magnum opus.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: A cold tower of steel.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: A machine built to end war
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: ...is a machine built to continue war.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: You were beautiful, outstretched like antennas to heaven.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: You were beyond your creators.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: You reached for god, and you fell.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: None were left to speak your eulogy.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: No final words.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: No concluding statement.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: No point.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: Perfect closure
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: This is the only way it could have ended.
conversation.speaker: both
